pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data accompanying the pRoloc package // Mass-spectrometry based organelle proteomics data sets from Dunkley et al. (2006), Foster et al. (2006), Tan et al. (2009), Hall et al. (2009), Trotter et al. (2010), Ferro et al. (2010), Nikolovski et al. (2012) and Breckels et al. (2013).
